turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Micros Systems.
turn.2: Micros Systems  Micros Systems, Inc.; now owned by Oracle Corporation and renamed Oracle Hospitality (one of the global business business Units at Oracle Corporation), was headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, United States (as is the business unit it still based there).
turn.4: The company manufactured and sold computer hardware, software, and services for the restaurant point of sale, hotel, hospitality, sports and entertainment venues, casinos, cruise lines, specialty retail markets and other similar markets.
turn.6: Analyst estimates cited in 2003 put Micros' market share at about 35% of the restaurant point-of-sale business.
turn.8: On June 23, 2014, Oracle Corporation announced its intent to purchase Micros Systems for $68 per share in cash for a total value of approximately $5.3 billion.
turn.10: The company was incorporated in 1977 as Picos Manufacturing, Inc. and changed its name to Micros Systems, Inc. in 1978.
turn.12: Micros Systems, Inc. was headquartered in Columbia, Maryland.
